column4: what is nowdays better, nvidia ~7500 or radeon ~x1650pro or ~hd2600pro ? I need good quality, excelent stability and good 3d games performance. If it can be done on open driver then the better
3d game performance and open source don't go together :)
so which closed driver is better? for nvidia or radeon?
I am probably not the best person to judge.. but someone here will have an opinion :)
